oracleReaderQuery.value: select CD_IF.FUNC_CDI_LOG(  'I' , p_pipline => 'PIP_M_CD_DDREAM_POS_MM_BARCODE_FULL' ) as result from dual

activities.name: ORA_SALESORD_OUT_DDREAM_D2
activities.description:
데이터드림 바코드 마스터
, 스토어 마스터, POS_DD_SALES,  PG적재

query.value:
SELECT MIN(to_char(base_date,'YYYYMMDD'))  as strdt
                               ,MAX(to_char(base_date,'YYYYMMDD')) as enddt
                           FROM CD_ODS.aps_sdc_pw_mst 
                          WHERE CMONTH2 BETWEEN '202101' AND '202303'
                            AND CMONTH2 <> '202301'
                          group by cmonth2
                          order by cmonth2
